text:
At Allure, we get inundated with the latest and greatest of beauty's offerings every day. Most of it is exciting, some of it confusing, and sometimes it gets overwhelming — alas, that is the beauty editor's burden to bear. When we really like something, though, you can trust that our opinion has come from vetting it against everything we've seen before. It's a big beauty playground out there and we'll gladly do the dirty work to test everything under the sun, and the top of the top often graduate to our Best of Beauty trials.

Speaking about overwhelming — let's stick to the present for now and just talk about the brand-new hair, makeup, and skin-care products we're obsessing over right now.
title: Allure Beauty Editors’ Favorite Beauty Products This Week

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: These are the beauty products Allure editors vetted and voted for — our new and exciting, favorite beauty picks. Since we get to see and test every new beauty product launch that comes out, there's a lot to go through and here are the ones that have impressed us as of late.
meta_data.keywords: editors' favorites,beauty products,allure editors,hair care,skin  care,makeup,fragrance,hair tools,editors picks

og.description: Allure editors call out the beauty picks we really use.
og.title: These Are Our Favorite New Beauty Products This Week
